CHAT.comment: INV enters room with Robodog.
INV leaves room.
child and mom move to the floor to see robodog.
mom laughs.
child grabs robodog's tail, and as it moves, gives a surprised look to mom, who laughs.
robodog walks into leg of chair.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child brings robodog back to middle of room by its leg.
robodog stops moving in front of child.
child looks into robodog's eyes wondering why it stopped.
child grabs robodog's tail and it starts moving.
child puts his leg in front of robodog, then puts it on it on its side.
child bends robodog's tail up and down.
child brings robodog into center of room.
child knocks robodog down, then it gets up and walks away.
child moves over to robodog and starts bending tail.
child repeatedly bends tail.
mom points to top of robodog's back.
child goes over to robodog and presses on its back and robodog sits and shakes its head.
mom goes over and touches robodog's head, then moves back.
child makes unintelligible noise.
INV removes Robodog from room.
mom and child move back to the table.
INV enters room with degu.
child sticks his hand inside cage and degu reaches his head up.
mom and child both laugh.
child tries to put one finger inside cage.
child quickly pulls away finger from inside of cage after degu's nose touched child's finger.
child sticks finger near degu to feel it.
mom sticks finger into cage.
child sticks his finger in there but then quickly removes it.
mom and child laugh.
child moans.
child stands up to see degu but sits back down after degu touches his finger.
child stands up and makes unintelligible noises to degu as it runs around the cage.
child makes unintelligible noise and laughs.
child points to tube in middle of cage.
child repeatedly taps on cage and points to tube.
degu stands on hind legs and child stands up to point to tube.
mom sticks finger into cage.
child laughs.
mom and child laugh.
child makes unintelligible noises toward degu.
child makes noises at degu.
child points at tube and makes a sound.
child sticks finger in cage.
child laughs after degu touches his finger.
child makes motions with his hands.
INV removes degu from room.
INV uncovers fish tank.
child points to starfish.
child points to starfish.
child touches top of tank and tries to open it.
mom points to top left corner of tank.
child points to top middle of tank.
child moves to side of tank.
child lifts lid of tank.
mom points to right side of tank.
child moves to right side of tank.
child points to lower right side of tank.
mom moves over to right side of tank.
child sits on mom's lap.
child coughs.
child gets up to look at the starfish.
child kneels down to look closer.
child lays on the floor with his arms and legs in the air.
child lifts legs up in the air and mom laughs.
mom sticks her arm out.
child points in between his legs and mom laughs.
child stands up again.
child moves closer to tank.
mom whispers unintelligible phrase.
child whispers to starfish.
child talks to starfish.
INV covers fishtank
mom and child return to the table to sit.
INV enters the room with the toy car.
mom laughs.
INV leaves room.
child is referring to the hood of the car.
child opens the hood of the car and then closes it.
child motions to the steering wheel.
child is playing with the back of the car.
child drives car around table.
mom motions to the numbers on the car.
child coughs.
child dangles car over edge of table.
child turns the car over to see if it shows anything on the bottom.
mom and child utter unintelligible phrases simultaneously.
child lifts front of the car off of the table.
child lifts back of the car off of the table.
child slowly brings back of car down to table.
child slowly lifts front of car.
child points to mom's purse.
mom takes the car and drives it over child's head and makes growling noises.
mom drives the car across the table.
mom points to the bottom of the car.
child takes car from mom.
child drives the car around and searches for something around it.
INV takes toy car from table.
INV and mom laugh.
child covers his eyes and then mom does.
INV places meerkat on table.
INV leaves room.
child makes unintelligible noises while playing with meerkat.
child moves meerkat over to mom and motions to her to play with it.
mom has meerkat give child a kiss and makes a noise.
child covers his nose.
child moves over to lay on the couch.
mom looks at meerkat.
child points at meerkat and shakes his head no.
mom puts her hand out to child and laughs.
child sits up on the couch and gives meerkat a kiss.
child laughs and shies away in embarrassment.
child makes noise and nibbles on meerkat's nose.
mom laughs at child.
child plays with meerkat and makes noises, then accidentally hits its nose on the table.
child laughs and then repeatedly hits its nose on the table.
child nods his head and then knocks meerkat off the table.
child laughs.
child picks up the meerkat, whispers unintelligible phrase and then knocks it down again.
child then has it jump on mom's head and then fall to the floor.
child picks up meerkat and throws it across the room and then retrieves it.
mom tries to stand meerkat up but it almost falls over.
child almost loses balance on chair.
mom waves to child with paw of meerkat and tries to get his attention by calling his name.
child looks over at computer box and whispers something unintelligible about it.
child sees meerkat waving and waves back.
INV removes meerkat from room.
mom and child move over to computer box.
INV leaves.
computer box makes noise.
child walks away from computer box.
mom waves hand over computer box and it lights up.
she does it again and when child sees computer box light up he tries it as well.
child walks back over to computer box and pushes top sensor.
child waves hand over computer box.
child waves hand over computer box numerous times and becomes confused.
mom starts touching sensors on computer box.
child pushes mom's hand away from computer box.
child waves hand over computer box and touches it lightly a few times.
mom coughs.
computer box makes noise.
mom puts finger over top sensor.
mom touches top of computer box.
child looks under computer box.
mom touches middle sensor and computer box lights up.
mom touches middle sensor again and computer box lights up.
child touches middle sensor and computer box makes noise.
mom laughs.
child continues to touch different sensors on computer box to see what happens.
child walks away from computer box.
